    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    add_inventory_controller
    This class provides functionality for adding or updating ingredients in the inventory
    add_menu_item_controller
    This class provides functionality for updating and adding new items to the menu.
    customer
    Creates centralized object for customer properties
    db_connect
    This class provides a function to connect to the database stored in db_setup
    db_setup
    This class helps read the database information and stores the important properties of the database
    employee
    Creates centralized object for employee properties
    employee_data
    This class fetches the employee information from the database
    employee_data_controller
    This class provides functionality for viewing actions regarding the employees
    employee_records_controller
    Controller for the Employee Records page - It creates a table to display the employee records.
    enter_name_controller
    This controller provides functionality for the enter name page it forwards all order and customer information to the purchase page controller
    ingredient
    Represents an ingredient used in the inventory system.
    ingredients_data
    This class fetches the ingredients information from the database
    inventory_page_controller
    This controller provides functionality to view the product usage given a certain date range
    login_page_controller
    This class provides backend for the functionality of the login page
    Main
    This class is the main entry point for the application.
    manager_view_controller
    This class provides functionality for the manager page after login
    menu_items_page_controller
    This class provides functionality for the menu page
    new_employee_controller
    This class provides functionality for adding an employee
    order
    Represents a customer's order, which may contain multiple ordeitems objects.
    order_item
    This class represents indivual items (drinks and toppings) that collectively form an order
    order_page_controller
    This class provides functionality for the order page and dynamically load items from the database
    product
    Creates centralized object for product properties
    product_data
    This class fetches the product information from the database
    remove_employee_controller
    This class provides functionality for removing an employee
    sales_page_controller
    Controller for the Sales page - Initializes a default data range as the last 7 days - Takes in user-selected dates - Queries the database for sales totals for each item within the user provided or default range - Populates a table with the item names and its corresponding sales totals
    sales_page_controller.ItemRow
    Establish model for rows of sales table.
    transaction_page_controller
    This class provides functionality for the purchase page and commits all order and customer information to the database
    update_employee_controller
    This class provides functionality for updating employee info
    useful_functions
    This class contains useful functions that can be used across multiple controllers
    useful_functions.user_role
    User roles available to the app.
    view_inventory_controller
    This class provides functionality for viewing inventory by displaying all ingredients dynamically
    view_menu_items_controller
    This class provides functionality for the manager's control over the menu and to view the menu items
    x_report_controller
    This class provides functionality for the x report
    z_report_controller
    This class provides functionality for the z report
